nodes.text: The Force Unleashed Preview 2: Maris Brood and Kazdan Paratus

The Force Unleashed Preview 2: Maris Brood and Kazdan Paratus is a web supplement by Wizards of the Coast. It previews figures from the Star Wars Miniatures: The Force Unleashed set from the Star Wars Miniatures line, as well as containing supplementary information for the Star Wars Saga Edition Roleplaying Game which coincides with the release of The Force Unleashed Campaign Guide. The supplement was written by Gary M. Sarli and Sterling Hershey. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website and is the second of seven in the series of "The Force Unleashed" web enhancements. This article covers Maris Brood after she survived Order 66, and Kazdan Paratus during the end of the Clone Wars but before Order 66.
